data.message: I'm soooooo hyped for this album! I'm calling it...it's gonna be his best album to date. He's been way too low key with this one..I'm excited to see who he goes at. I need that motivation to get back to my music...and Ems music  has always pushed me back to the mic...

replies.message: His best album is The Eminem Show, though. Gonna be hard to top that

You look like a Douchebag so what's your point? You one of those guys who wakes up and jumps on Facebook to poke fun of people you don't know...lmao...you must feel so proud of yourself Lame. And wtf is a hard tard? You think of that all by yourself?  Grow up bruh.
I cant wait until he comes out with his album either. He is a dandelion...he will pop right back up and will be bigger and better than ever. Just watch...you'll see. 😊
Chris Hill Leave the dude alone, he didn't do anything to you. Jerk.
Over his first 3? Lol... Prepare to be disappointed
At this rate the album will be out in 2029
Massive lol at "his best album to date".
He sucks now. Never ever gonna top his first 3 albums. Sorry buddy

Sooo..if he sucks..you won't be listening to his new album. Right? Walk on Water is dedicated to people like you. Fake ass fans who just want EM to rap about pills...hating his wife and Overdosing...he's growing...and he's more lyrical than ever..go listen to all the Lil rappers if you want drugs..go mumble with Future if you wanna be relevant
It will never be his best album
